13643.name: Indoor Schemes
13643.description:
Create your first own indoor scheme and navigate around your building with no problems.

  1. Build your scheme using simple Figma components
  2. Add its floors, rooms and paths to plugin
  3. Save final data and load it in our web service

Here you can find instruction for using our Indoor Schemes plugin.

Have fun in using our plugin!

14106.name: Zest
14106.description:
Zest is Animation Made Easy.


Create CSS animations in Figma an instant with Zest!


Full instructions at:

https://daniel-cotton.github.io/zest-figma/


Zest is in early access, supporting a number of Figma features but not all, please see full instructions for guidance!

14129.name: Perfect‚Ä∫‚Ä∫radius
14129.description:
How many times have you created an element, added your auto-layout constraints and then needed to work out what either the inner or outer radius of the other element should be?


Well now you can get it automatically with Perfect‚Ä∫‚Ä∫radius. Simply:

  • Create a Frame, Component or Instance
  • Add another Frame, Component, Instance or a Rectangle inside it
  • Set Auto-layout constraints and define your padding value
  • Set a corner radius on one of the elements
  • Set either the inner or outer radius of the other element with a click of a button


These plugins are free to us, but if you fancy buying me a coffee because it's been useful to you, I'd be grateful: https://ko-fi.com/kemiljk
14129.release_notes: Minor update to add some code refactoring

14159.name: L√∂rem Ipsum
14159.description:
L√∂rem Ipsum - generated faux Swedish for the masses! Works with selected text nodes. Comes with a multitude of options:

  • Number of paragraphs generated
  • Sentences per paragraph
  • Max sentence length
  • Minimum sentence length
  • Amount of new Swedish words
  • Amount of faux academic neologisms
  • Amount of names (based on 100 most common Swedish first names/surnames)
  • Amount of digital marketing buzzwords
  • Option to add a punchline ending random paragraphs
  • Format as headline
  • Generate names only
  • Option to begin with "L√∂rem ipsum..."


Demo (in Swedish) here: https://lhli.net/stuff/l%C3%B6remIpsum/

14309.name: DOCX Viewer
14309.description:
Preview your DOCX files in Figma.


Optional:

  • save your preview in cache
  • clear cache
  • change window size
  • adding images to Figma by clicking on the image
14309.release_notes:
- performance update for adding images to Figma
- added options for saving/deleting current preview in cache
- update style

13813.name: Figside
13813.description:
Figside allows you to ship websites with Figma. Thanks to this plugin you can easily add Web behaviours like responsive grid, layout max/min height and width, navigation between Figma pages and more!


Learn more about Figside at https://figside.com

14326.name: Version History ‚Üí Slack
14326.description:
Version History ‚Üí Slack

Or VHS for short, sends version info from your Figma documents to your custom Slack Webhook. A comprehensive step-by-step guide is available in the Community.


How to use VHS ‚ùì

  1. Run plugin;
  2. Provide the requested information:‚Ä®Slack Webhook URL, Figma API Token, Figma Document URL, and Document Name;
  3. Select the desired Date Format, and Date Separator;
  4. Press ‚ÄúGet versions‚Äù;
  5. The plugin will display the 5 most recent versions with info details;
  6. Click on the version you want to send to Slack;
  7. If successful, the Slack Webhook should treat the information according to the defined Workflow.


The plugin has 3 options:

  • Date Format: select your preference for date formatting;
  • Date Separator: pick a character to separate the date;
  • Keep window open: If switched on, the plugin window will remain open after sending a message. You will be able to pick another version to send to Slack.


Use Cases üî®

  • Share Design System updates in a Slack Channel;
  • Send yourself a log of changes of an important project;
  • Inform a colleague of recent changes to a file you are working on together;
  • Keep track of different proposals;
  • Log the evolution of a project in a Google Sheet;
  • Pass the version info to Zapier;
  • Anything else you find it useful for!


In Detail üîé

  • The plugin will discard versions without description;
  • Due to the way Figma plugins are built, it is not possible to confirm if the message reaches Slack correctly;
  • The plugin is document agnostic, hence the need to input a Document URL;
  • You can only get versions from a file where you have Edit permissions. The plugin will report ‚ÄúNo versions found‚Äù for any file you try to access without the right permissions.

14128.name: Now inside!
14128.description:
For situations when objects are outside the frame and you want to insert them into it saving their location, but the list of layers is not easy to navigate quickly. 


Select the frame and the layers to be inserted and run the plugin.


Don't forget about a quick launch of the last launched plugin ‚Äî Command + Option + P or Ctrl + Alt + P for Windows.

14013.name: Artify Illustrations
14013.description:
Access more than 5000 illustrations from the Artify library directly inside Figma using our plugin


Spend less time searching and sorting and more time designing. Artify offers over 5000 illustrations in SVG & PNG formats that you can access from Figma using our plugin


Features You'll Love:


Built-in Search Function

Use keywords to find exactly what you need quickly & hassle free - our illustrations contain over 100,000 tags to help you get to the content you need easily


Import function

Import high resolution PNG files for your projects with up to 4000x4000px


Huge Styles Selection

Enjoy the wide variety of styles available in the Artify, 80+ distinctively unique illustration styles ranging from simple line to 3D designs


Import editable vectors

Import any style you want as vector graphics, the majority of Artify's illustrations are available in SVG file format


Made in Artify with a lot of <3

13842.name: Handoff notes
13842.description:
Prepare your work for handoff. Generate a note frame below each screen explain it and help others to understand the static designs better.


How to use:

  1. Select a frame
  2. Add a note
  3. Document your designs


This plugin is currently in a beta, please provide any feedback or feature requests you have via the provided email..

14206.name: Node Decoder
14206.description:
Converts any Figma layer to Plugin API compatible code and avoids the need to code visual assets manually when developing plugins.


Generating source code


  1. Select one or more layers/nodes
  2. Run plugin Plugins > Node Decoder
  3. Copy the generated source code


Features


  • Generates most of the source code needed to create, frames, shapes, vectors, text, groups, boolean operations, components and component sets
  • Provides syntax highlighted code which you can copy to use in your own plugin
  • Detects when text layers are present and provides a function for loading fonts before setting text properties
  • Automatically creates components needed for selection if not selected by the user


Known limitations


  • Selection ideally should made at the top level
  • Source code for paint, text, effect or grid styles are not generated yet
  • Properties for instances with overrides are not generated yet
  • Some frames which use Auto Layout may be slightly off because of when properties are applied
